summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 1.8°C) and outside temperature (up 1.5°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 6%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 485 m), outside temperature (up 3.3°C), and feels like temperature (up 3.3°C) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 156.3m lower than yesterday, 436.1m lower than past week, 485.3m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 269m minimum and 930m maximum, with an average of 387.1m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 823.2m and 872.4m.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and mostly calm with light air movement. A few light raindrops may fall, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and it’s dark. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
